Package com.github.yona168.giraffe.net.messenger.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Server
    The central object to route client connections.
    Server
    The central object to route client connections.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GServer
    The given implementation for interface Server. This class uses a MutableMap to store client UUIDs to the interface Client objects, which represent server-side connections. CoroutineScope.coroutineContext is overriden with Dispatchers.IO+AbstractScopedPacketChannelComponent.getJob. After accepting a Client, it writes a handshake packet (see class GClient description), giving it a session UUID as referenced by Client.getSessionUUID. Any interface Client that uses this server should handle the packet accordingly, or ignore it.
    GServer
    The given implementation for interface Server. This class uses a MutableMap to store client UUIDs to the interface Client objects, which represent server-side connections. CoroutineScope.coroutineContext is overriden with Dispatchers.IO+AbstractScopedPacketChannelComponent.getJob. After accepting a Client, it writes a handshake packet (see class GClient description), giving it a session UUID as referenced by Client.getSessionUUID. Any interface Client that uses this server should handle the packet accordingly, or ignore it.
